snippet: Gov. Rick Snyder of Michigan calls for one entity to manage debt and another to oversee day-to-day school operations.
abstract: Michigan Gov Rick Snyder unveils proposal to overhaul Detroit public school system by creating two districts--one to manage debt and other to oversee schools daily operations; hundreds of teachers gather at State Capitol in Lansing to protest plan.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Snyder of Michigan calls for one entity to manage debt and another to oversee day-to-day school operations.

headline.main: Plan Unveiled to Overhaul School System in Detroit
headline.print_headline: Plan Unveiled to Overhaul School System in Detroit
